transcription: Hi, cat lovers. I'm Amy from Chewy. And if you want to be your cat's number one, feed her well with Purino One. Almost all of Purino One's dry cat food recipes are high in protein and feature real meat as their first ingredient. Select recipes even feature shredded meaty morsels. Purino One knows that your cat is one of a kind, so they offer formulas with tailored nutrition to help meet your cat's specific needs. They have dry recipes for kittens, indoor cats, and mature cats.  They have formulas to address specific needs, including urinary tract health, hairballs, sensitive stomachs, and healthy metabolism. Their Indoor Advantage and Hairball recipes both contain a blend of healthy fibers that promote digestion and help break up hairballs. Urinary tract health provides low magnesium to help reduce your cat's urinary pH. And healthy metabolism is made with lean turkey and L-carnitine, which helps spayed and neutered cats convert fat into energy so they can make  maintain a healthy body weight. To add moisture to your cat's diet, check out Purina One wet food. They're rich in protein and help keep your cat hydrated, which is good for her whole body health. These recipes are available in pates or chunks and gravy. They also have healthy weight canned recipes available in Ideal Weight or Healthy Metabolism. Well, that's everything you need to know about the one and only Purina One. I'm Amy. Thanks for watching.  Cheers.
